attributes.action: Pay retired firefighters and police officers money owed due to admin error.
attributes.additional_details:
""Retired Firefighters and Police officers have been issued with lesser lump sums than they would have received had the Govt fulfilled its obligations to review the arrangements for calculating lump sum payments received on retirement.
A five year legal process is nearly complete.
If the decision is made that the firefighters have been shortchanged we , the undersigned, demand that the government guarantee that the payments will be made in a speedy and straightforward manner.
